import React from 'react' import Row from'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from'react-bootstrap/Col' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' function Product(props) { const {product}=props; return ( {product.name} {product.name}

${product.price}

) } export default Product
